title: Scenario-Based Classroom Management Online Mastery (K-12)

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theories and understanding of basic classroom management principles
context.additional_context: Ensuring seamless learning experiences in smartphone environments, with a focus on strengthening the connection between theory and practice.

learning_goals: Learners can select optimal classroom management strategies for specific scenarios by analyzing real classroom situation scenarios
Learners can model teacher decision-making processes through multimedia-based case studies and establish their own management philosophy
Learners can demonstrate positive transfer between theoretical knowledge and practical applications through formative assessment tasks

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
